text: Nadia Lutfi or Nadia Loutfi (; born Poula Mohamed Mostafa Shafiq (); 3 January 1937 â€“ 4 February 2020) was an Egyptian actress. Her best known roles were The Night of Counting the Years and Saladin the Victorious. Lutfi died on 4 February 2020 at a hospital in Cairo at the age of 83.Egyptian Actress Nadia Lutfi Dies Aged 83 ==References== ==Other websites== * Cairo Station film review * Profile Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Cairo
